summary: Completed CryptoVault enterprise platform testing as requested. Backend APIs work correctly with public URL, frontend loads successfully, Vite proxy forwards requests properly, but frontend has environment configuration inconsistency.

working_endpoints: GET /api/health returns status:healthy with database connected
CORS headers properly configured for preview URL origin
Admin API endpoints exist and require authentication (401)
Auth endpoints work and reject invalid credentials properly

working_features: Admin login page loads at http://localhost:3000/admin/login with proper form
Vite proxy forwards /api/* to backend on port 8001 correctly
Navigation elements and interactive components work (21 buttons, 56 links)
Admin login form has proper test IDs and form validation

environment_config_issues.issue: VITE_API_BASE_URL points to external URL (https://auth-fix-119.preview.emergentagent.com) but Vite proxy expects VITE_BACKEND_URL variable
environment_config_issues.impact: Frontend makes direct calls to external API instead of using local proxy, causing CORS errors
environment_config_issues.details: Frontend loads and works, but API calls bypass proxy due to environment variable mismatch

passed_tests: Backend health check - GET /api/health returns status:healthy ✓
Frontend homepage loads at http://localhost:3000 without errors ✓
Admin login page loads at http://localhost:3000/admin/login ✓
API endpoint /api/crypto returns crypto data (20 cryptocurrencies) ✓
CORS headers properly set for preview URL origin ✓
Socket.IO endpoint /socket.io/ accessible with successful handshake ✓
Vite proxy forwards /api/* to backend on port 8001 ✓
Admin API endpoints exist and require authentication ✓
Auth endpoints work - POST /api/auth/login properly rejects invalid credentials ✓
All interactive elements render correctly on both pages ✓
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend environment configuration inconsistency: Either update VITE_API_BASE_URL to point to localhost for development, or update Vite config to use VITE_API_BASE_URL instead of VITE_BACKEND_URL. Currently frontend tries to call external APIs directly instead of using the working proxy.

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (pages load correctly, proxy works, but env config mismatch)
success_percentage.integration: 95% (Vite proxy works, but frontend bypasses it due to config)
